#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#define size 1005
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long int N,P;
        long int ar[size];
        cin>>N>>P;
        for(long int i=1;i<=N;i++)
        {
            scanf("%ld",&ar[i]);
        }
        long int count=0;
        for(long int j=1;j<=N;j++)
        {
            if(ar[j]>=P)
                count++;
        }
        cout<<count;
        cout<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
